languages.text: "Гипотеза — даже для столь нечестивого конструкта пребывание под гнетом гемункула было невыносимо и болезненно".
"Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."
languages.original_text: "Гипотеза — даже для столь нечестивого конструкта пребывание под гнетом гемункула было невыносимо и болезненно".

traits.locale_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「思うに…ハモンキュラスの抑圧の下に存在することは、そのような穢れた構造物にとってさえ、耐え難く苦痛であったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."

traits.locale_text: 「思うに…ハモンキュラスの抑圧の下に存在することは、そのような穢れた構造物にとってさえ、耐え難く苦痛であったんだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “提出假设：即便对如此邪恶的造物而言，在血伶人的压迫下生存也充满了痛苦，令人无法忍受。”
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."

traits.locale_text: “提出假设：即便对如此邪恶的造物而言，在血伶人的压迫下生存也充满了痛苦，令人无法忍受。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Presentando una hipótesis. Existir bajo la opresión del Hemónculo era insoportable y doloroso incluso para un constructo tan impío».
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."

traits.locale_text: «Presentando una hipótesis. Existir bajo la opresión del Hemónculo era insoportable y doloroso incluso para un constructo tan impío».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hypothese: Unter der Pein des Haemonculus zu existieren war selbst für ein solch unheiliges Konstrukt unerträglich und schmerzhaft."
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."

traits.locale_text: "Hypothese: Unter der Pein des Haemonculus zu existieren war selbst für ein solch unheiliges Konstrukt unerträglich und schmerzhaft."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Hypothèse : exister sous l'oppression de l'hémoncule était insupportable et douloureux, même pour une structure aussi impie. »
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."

traits.locale_text: « Hypothèse : exister sous l'oppression de l'hémoncule était insupportable et douloureux, même pour une créature aussi impie. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bir hipotez sunuyorum. Haimonkulus'un baskısı altında var olmak, böylesi kötücül bir yapı için bile dayanılmaz ve acılı imiş."
languages.original_text: "Presenting a hypothesis. Existing under the oppression of the Haemonculus was unbearable and painful even for such an unholy construct."

traits.locale_text: "Bir hipotez sunuyorum. Haimonkulus'un baskısı altında var olmak, böylesi kötücül bir yapı için bile dayanılmaz ve acılı imiş."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
